member.name: T:VVVV.Audio.MIDI.TimeArrayIterator
member.summary: Iterates thru an array of time values

member.name: M:VVVV.Audio.MIDI.TimeArrayIterator.Init(System.Double)
member.summary: Move the index to the time just before the input time

member.name: M:VVVV.Audio.MIDI.TimeArrayIterator.HasTime(System.Double)
member.summary: True if the current index time is lower than the input time

member.name: M:VVVV.Audio.MIDI.MidiSequence.Init(System.Double)
member.summary: Sets the sequence to the current beat, called just before first Read() call

member.name: M:VVVV.Audio.MIDI.MidiSequence.Read(System.Double[],System.Int32)
member.summary: Called from the sequence signal just befor the audio buffer will be calculated
member.param: Array of beat time values for each sample of the next buffer

member.name: M:VVVV.Audio.MIDI.MidiSequenceSignal.NotifyProcess(System.Int32)
member.summary: Called just befor the audio buffer will be calculated
